msg.msgText: Name Name of the Endpoint Description A description of the Endpoint Enabled Specify state of Endpoint object Options:True,False Default:True Port Service port to listen on Options:1-65535 Protocol Comma-delimited list of protocols Options: JMS,MQTT If there are any protocol plug-ins installed on the IBM MessageSight server, you can specify these as well. Default:JMS,MQTT Interface An IPv4 address, an IPv6 address. To specify all interfaces, use an asterisk, or set "Interface=All". Default:All SecurityProfile Name of the Security profile ConnectionPolicies Comma-delimited list of ConnectionPolicy object names MessagingPolicies Comma-delimited list of MessagingPolicy object names MaxMessageSize Maximum size of message. The value must contain K, KB, M or MB suffix. Options:1KB-262144KB Default:1024KB MaxSendSize The maximum size of a network send. Options:128-65536 BatchMessages Specify whether messages can be sent in batches. Options:True,False Default:True

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
